data.Description:
Commercial Credit Card is suitable for customers who:
- Need to keep business and personal spending separate 
- Want to buy now and pay later 
- Buy goods and services at home and abroad 
- Wish to buy goods and services securely on-line 
- Wish to issue up unlimited  cards to employees for business spend 
- Need occasional short term borrowing or to cover unexpected expenses

Eligibility.EligibilityNotes: Eligibility for previous bankruptcy, subject to credit check

data.KeyFeatures:
- MasterCard Commercial card - can be used anywhere MasterCard is accepted
- Pay the full amount each month  by direct debit each month
- Up to 37 days interest free days on full payment by direct debit
- DD is taken 7 days after statement issue date
- Contactless payment for purchases under Â£30
- Extra payments can be made any time to  increase available credit. Account cannot be put into credit
- Company name printed on cards
- Identity theft assistance - Liability waiver insurance
- Comprehensive travel insurance - covers up to 3 travelling companions
